name: Shorten Me: Array Declaration XI (Triangle)
description:
# Shorten Me: Array Declaration XI (Triangle)
---
## Task
You have to write an `array()` function returning an *array* object with elements as follow:
```javascript
[
	[9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1,0],
	[8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1,0],
	[7,6,5,4,3,2,1,0],
	[6,5,4,3,2,1,0],
	[5,4,3,2,1,0],
	[4,3,2,1,0],
	[3,2,1,0],
	[2,1,0],
	[1,0],
	[0]
]
``` 
### Coding Limitation:
Less than `70` characters
